title: The Challenge of Combating International Profit Shifting
dc:creator: Sebastian Bustos
description:
Tax policy reform in Chile, aimed at reducing corporate profit shifting schemes, did not accomplish its intended effects. Instead, the impact was increased business for the tax consulting industry. In 2019, Google reported 26.5 billion USD in profits in Bermuda. This is clearly not because all of Googleâ€™s customers or all of their workers happen […]
